title: Emmys 2019: See All the Red-Carpet Fashion
text:
Laverne Cox. Photo: John Shearer/Getty Images

Tonight, television’s hottest celebrities come together for the 71st annual Primetime Emmy Awards in Los Angeles. This year’s ceremony will be missing one major element: a host. Last year’s Emmys hosts, Colin Jost and Michael Che, may turn out to be the ceremony’s final MCs, as it looks like this year’s hostless Oscars inspired Fox to follow suit. We’ve already predicted which nominees will take home Emmy gold in comedy, drama, limited series, and variety series — fingers crossed for Fleabag, Fosse/Verdon, Jodie Comer, Bill Hader, and Julia Louis-Dreyfus! — and also said our piece about giving any more winged women to Game of Thrones. But before the show can begin, the stars must walk this year’s red carpet in their most glamorous garments. See all of the looks from TV’s biggest night below.

Indya Moore, Pose. Photo: VALERIE MACON/AFP/Getty Images

Jameela Jamil, The Good Place. Photo: Frazer Harrison/Getty Images

Laverne Cox, Orange Is the New Black. Photo: Steve Granitz/WireImage

Greta Lee, Russian Doll. Photo: VALERIE MACON/AFP/Getty Images

Alfie Allen, Game of Thrones. Photo: VALERIE MACON/AFP/Getty Images

Brittany Snow. Photo: Steve Granitz/WireImage

Patricia Clarkson, Sharp Objects. Photo: (C)Kevin Mazur/Getty Images

Catherine O’Hara, Schitt’s Creek. Photo: John Shearer/Getty Images

Annie Murphy, Schitt’s Creek. Photo: Frazer Harrison/Getty Images

Bob Odenkirk, Better Call Saul. Photo: Steve Granitz/WireImage

Padma Lakshmi. Photo: John Shearer/Getty Images

Alex Moffat, Mikey Day, Kyle Mooney, Kenan Thompson, and Beck Bennett, Saturday Night Live. Photo: Frazer Harrison/Getty Images

Melissa Villaseñor, SNL. Photo: Steve Granitz/WireImage

James Van Der Beek. Photo: Steve Granitz/WireImage

Robin Weigert, Big Little Lies. Photo: (C)Kevin Mazur/Getty Images

Betty Gilpin, GLOW. Photo: Steve Granitz/WireImage

Anna Chlumsky. Photo: Frazer Harrison/Getty Images

Sterling K. Brown, This Is Us. Photo: Steve Granitz/WireImage

Ryan Michelle Bathe. Photo: (C)Kevin Mazur/Getty Images

Chris Sullivan, This Is Us. Photo: Jeff Kravitz/FilmMagic

Bethenny Frankel. Photo: (C)Kevin Mazur/Getty Images

Steven Canals, Pose. Photo: Steve Granitz/WireImage

Kathryn Newton, Big Little Lies. Photo: ROBYN BECK/AFP/Getty Images

Dascha Polanco, Orange Is the New Black. Photo: (C)Kevin Mazur/Getty Images

William Jackson Harper, The Good Place. Photo: Frazer Harrison/Getty Images

Brett Gelman, Fleabag. Photo: VALERIE MACON/AFP/Getty Images

Nicole Silverberg, Full Frontal screenwriter. Photo: Frazer Harrison/Getty Images

Charlie Barnett, Russian Doll. Photo: Frazer Harrison/Getty Images

Sarah Goldberg, Barry. Photo: Frazer Harrison/Getty Images
description: See all the red-carpet looks for the 71th annual Primetime Emmy Awards in Los Angeles, including Laverne Cox, Indya Moore, Kristin Cavallari, Jameela Jamil, Milo Ventimiglia, and many more.
